text: Young Ideas is a 1943 American romantic comedy film directed by Jules Dassin and starring Susan Peters, Herbert Marshall and Mary Astor. ==Plot== Josephine Evans and Professor Michael Kingsley are in a romantic relationship, something not approved of by Evan's two children. They try to disrupt the relationship with salacious incidents taken from their mother's fiction books, presenting them as true things their mother has done, hoping Kingsley would be displeased. ==Cast== ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1943 films Category:1943 comedy films Category:1943 romantic comedy films Category:American films Category:American romantic comedy films Category:American black-and-white films Category:English-language films Category:Films directed by Jules Dassin Category:Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer films
title: Young Ideas
